git.commitMessage:
feat: Allow empty tables to persist for 20 minutes

- Tables no longer deleted immediately when all players leave
- Empty tables have a 20-minute grace period before deletion
- Players can leave and come back to the same table
- Timeout cancelled when someone joins the empty table
- System messages inform when table becomes/stops being empty
- First player to join empty table becomes the new host
- Bots are removed when table becomes empty (cleaner state)

sprint18.name: Side Betting System
features: Side betting system for players and spectators
Preset bets with auto-resolution (red 0 winner, brown 0 victim, bet made, etc.)
Custom bets with manual resolution and dispute handling
Side bets panel integrated in game header

newFeatures: Side betting system with preset and custom bet types
Manual resolution with dispute handling for custom bets

Bet creation modal with preset options
notes: Preset bets auto-resolve based on game events
